original_text: So Eleazar the priest collected the bronze censers brought by those who had been burned to death, and he had them hammered out to overlay the altar,
korean_text: 제사장 엘르아살이 불탄 자들이 드렸던 놋 향로를 가져다가 쳐서 제단을 싸서

sentences.original_text: So Eleazar the priest collected the bronze censers
brought by those who had been burned to death
sentences.korean_translation: 불에 타 죽은 자들이 가져왔던 것들

sentences.original_text: and he had them hammered out
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그것들을 두드려 펴게 했고
